amendment.description: An amendment numbered 97 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to require the FAA Administrator to conduct a study on the diversity of the cybersecurity workforce of the FAA in order to develop recommendations to increase the size, quality and diversity of such workforce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
